affect ( "shopguard02", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_VIEWDIST", 400.000 );

	task ( "guard02patrol" )
	{
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "Guard" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "shopguard02_nav01" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL2", "shopguard02_nav02" );
	}

	dowait ( "guard02patrol" );
}
